scheme: {"title":"师生报平安","remarks":"","authcheck":true,"questions":[{"name":"tbrq","type":"datetime","title":"填报日期(Date)","readonly":true,"defaultval":"now","required":true},{"name":"zddy","type":"lbs","title":"自动定位(Automatic location)","readonly":true,"required":true},{"name":"mqszd","type":"citys","title":"目前所在地","readonly":true,"required":true},{"name":"sfjcs110","type":"radio","title":"近14天是否有与疫情中、高风险地区人员的接触史？(Did you contact any person(s) from medium or high risk area of the epidemic in the past 14 days?)","required":true,"options":[{"title":"是(Yes)"},{"title":"否(NO)"}]},{"name":"sfjcs2","type":"radio","title":"近14天是否有与疑似、确诊人员的接触史?(In the past 14 days, did you contact any COVID-19 suspected or confirmed person(s)?)","required":true,"options":[{"title":"是(Yes)"},{"title":"否(NO)"}]},{"name":"sfdgyq0","type":"radio","title":"近21天是否有中高风险地区旅居史，近14天是否有中高风险地区所在区旅居史？( In the past 21 days, have you been to medium or high-risk area? In the past 14 days, have you been to any places close to medium or high risk breathing?)","required":true,"options":[{"title":"是(Yes)"},{"title":"否(NO)"}]},{"name":"jssfjcs10","type":"radio","title":"同住家属近14天是否有与疫情中、高风险地区人员或疑似、确诊人员的接触史？(Did your family member (s) living days?)","required":true,"options":[{"title":"是(Yes)"},{"title":"否(NO)"}]},{"name":"jssfdgyq","type":"radio","title":"同住家属近14天是否到过疫情中、高风险地区？(Have any family members living together been to medium or What's the color of today's health code?","required":true,"options":[{"title":"绿码(Green code)"},{"title":"黄码(Yellow code)"},{"title":"红码(Red code)"}]},{"name":"sfcrj","type":"radio","title":"本人或家庭成员(包括其他亲密接触人员)是否有近28日入境或未来7日拟入境的情况?Have you or your family members(including other close contact persons) entered China over the past 28 days or plan to enter China in 7 days?","required":true,"options":[{"title":"是 Yes(请及时向所在单位报告实际情况,Please contact your college/school immediately.)"},{"title":"否 No"}]}],"danger":[{"name":"yqryjcs","title":"近14天是否有与疫情中、高风险地区人员的接触史？","value":"是","alias":"疫区人员接触史"},{"name":"ysqrjcs","title":"近14天是否有与疑似、确诊人员的接触史?","value":"是","alias":"疑似确认接触史"},{"name":"dgyq","title":"近14天是否到过疫情中、高风险地区？","value":"是","alias":"到过疫区"},{"name":"yxgc","title":"现是否处于医学观察状态？","value":"是","alias":"医学观察"},{"name":"jjgl","title":"现是否处于居家隔离状态？","value":"是","alias":"居家隔离"},{"name":"jkyq","title":"现身体状况，是否存在发热体温、寒战、咳嗽、胸闷以及呼吸困难等症状？","value":"是","alias":"健康异常"},{"name":"jsjjgl","title":"同住家属现是否处于医学观察状态?","value":"是","alias":"家属医学观察"}]}
